Title: Point
Description: The `coordinates` field is a single position.

Title: MultiPoint
Description: The `coordinates` field is an array of positions.

Title: LineString
Description: The `coordinates` field is an array of two or more positions.

Title: MultiLineString
Description: The `coordinates` field is an array of LineString coordinate arrays.

Title: Polygon
Description: The `coordinates` field is an array of linear ring coordinate arrays.

Title: MultiPolygon
Description: The `coordinates` field is an array of Polygon coordinate arrays.
